1.name: Sarah Chen
1.description: Investigative journalist with sharp eyes and determination
1.goals: Expose the truth about government corruption

2.name: Detective Mike Rodriguez
2.description: Veteran detective with a weathered face and kind eyes
2.goals: Solve the case and protect Sarah
2.conflicts: Department politics vs. doing what's right

3.name: Senator James Whitmore
3.description: Powerful politician with expensive suits and cold demeanor
3.goals: Maintain power and cover up corruption

1.title: The Tip
1.action: Sarah sits at her desk, surrounded by newspaper clippings. She's been working late, and the office is nearly empty. Her phone rings with an anonymous tip about government corruption.
1.goal: Introduce Sarah and the central mystery

2.title: Meeting the Detective
2.action: Sarah meets Detective Rodriguez to discuss the case. He's initially skeptical but becomes intrigued by her evidence. They form an uneasy alliance.
2.goal: Establish the partnership between Sarah and Mike

3.title: The Senator's Office
3.action: Sarah confronts Senator Whitmore with her findings. He denies everything but his nervous behavior reveals the truth. The tension builds as they engage in a verbal chess match.
3.goal: Show the confrontation and establish the antagonist

4.title: The Chase
4.action: Sarah and Mike are chased through the dark alley by unknown assailants. They must work together to escape, revealing their growing trust and the danger they're in.
4.goal: Create action and show the stakes

1.name: City News Office
1.description: Busy newsroom with desks, computers, and coffee machines

2.name: Police Station
2.description: Old building with worn furniture and case files everywhere

3.name: Senate Building
3.description: Imposing government building with marble floors and security

4.name: Dark Alley
4.description: Narrow alley with dumpsters and graffiti-covered walls
